topic.title: Task types
topic.shortdesc: Tasks domains, types and subtypes were defined to ease understanding software product features, and what benefits they provide to a software user. From the business point of view we may divide all possible tasks into separate domains: Functional Tasks and Product tasks. Tasks are divided into types within each domain and may be divided into subtypes.

body.p: Functional Tasks domain comprises all tasks that are related to installing, maintenance and using software products by bank employees and their clients. Functional tasks are handled by bank employees and their clients. Functional domain tasks are divided into seven types, each task type may have subtypes.

Product Tasks domain comprises all tasks which manufacturer employees handle to design, produce, sale, deliver and putting its products to use. Product task types are associated with enterprise processes and are divided into types. Each task type may have subtypes.
